amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, Federal Prison System by $1 million and increases funding for Pay for Sucess programs within the Department of Justice by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, Federal Prison System by $1 million and increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Activities (criminal justice programs) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
